name: com.magicleap.unitysdk
description: Provides implementations of Magic Leap OpenXR extension APIs and XR subsystems for building and running on the Magic Leap 2.

samples.description: These sample assets are designed for use with OpenXR. Contains an ML Rig prefab with XROrigin and TrackedPoseDrivers for the HMD and Controller, as well as a sample InputActions asset with ML Controller Actions bound to OpenXR action paths.
This sample uses the Gaze Interaction profile to track your eye gaze around the scene.
This sample uses the Global Dimmer to dim the environment around you, allowing for adjusting the value or toggling dimmer on/off.
This sample uses the Marker Understanding feature to retrieve information on QR codes.
This sample detects surfaces and displays planes in your environment with the Planes subsystem feature.
This sample demonstrates the effects of Segmented Dimmer via AlphaBlend mode.
This sample demonstrates viewing and switching between different meshing modes.
